      • getDefaultMask

        public static long getDefaultMask(java.util.EventListener el)
        Gets the default mask for an event listener.

      • getDefaultMask

        public static long getDefaultMask(java.util.EventObject e)
        Gets the default mask for an event.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.util.EventListener el)
        Adds the listener to the tree with a default mask.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.util.EventListener el,
               long mask)
        Adds the listener with the specified mask. If its an EventMulticaster the specified mask will be ignored.

      • fireEvent

        public void fireEvent(java.util.EventObject e)
        Fires an event to all applicable listeners.

      • fireEvent

        public void fireEvent(java.util.EventObject e,
             long mask)
        Fires an event to all listeners, restricted by the mask.

      • getEnabledMask

        public long getEnabledMask()
        Gets the masks enabled for this multicaster.

      • getListeners

        public java.util.List<java.util.EventListener> getListeners()
        Returns an unmodifiable list of the backing list of listeners.

      • isEnabled

        public final boolean isEnabled(long mask)
        Returns whether the mask is enabled on this multicaster.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(java.util.EventListener el)
        Removes a listener. Cleans up the masks.
